016package de.cuioss.uimodel.model.code;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020import java.util.Locale;
021
022import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
023import lombok.Getter;
024import lombok.ToString;
025
026/**
027 * Simple implementation of {@link CodeType} that ignores the {@link Locale}
028 * attribute on {@link #getResolved(Locale)} and always returns a previously
029 * configured string.
030 *
031 * @author Oliver Wolff
032 */
033@EqualsAndHashCode
034@ToString
035public class CodeTypeImpl implements CodeType {
036
037    private static final long serialVersionUID = 6827791409255699288L;
038
039    private final String resolved;
040
041    @Getter
042    private final String identifier;
043
044    /**
045     * @param resolved   must not be null
046     * @param identifier must not be null
047     */
048    public CodeTypeImpl(final String resolved, final String identifier) {
049        this.resolved = requireNonNull(resolved, "resolved must not be null");
050        this.identifier = requireNonNull(identifier, "identifier must not be null");
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * @param resolved to be used as resolved and identifier.
055     */
056    public CodeTypeImpl(final String resolved) {
057        this(resolved, resolved);
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public String getResolved(final Locale locale) {
062        return resolved;
063    }
064
065}
